channel.title: FCC on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in FCC on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: David Ellison Met With FCC Chairman in Push to Finalize Approval for Paramount Deal
item.description: Ellison “discussed Skydance’s commitment to unbiased journalism and its embrace of diverse viewpoints” in the meeting, as well as concerns about Tencent’s stake in the company.

item.title: David Ellison Met With FCC Chairman in Push to Finalize Approval for Paramount Deal
item.description: Ellison “discussed Skydance’s commitment to unbiased journalism and its embrace of diverse viewpoints” in the meeting, as well as concerns about Tencent’s stake in the company.

item.title: What Will It Take to Get the Paramount-Skydance Deal Done?
item.description: A CBS News ombudsman? Ending DEI? Moving staff from New York to Pittsburgh?

item.title: What Will It Take to Get the Paramount-Skydance Deal Done?
